name: Ted Sidecar
description: Registers /ted commands that call the local Ted Engine sidecar with strict loopback and path allowlist guards (doctor, status, catalog).

baseUrl.label: Ted Sidecar Base URL
baseUrl.help: Loopback-only base URL for Ted sidecar (default: http://127.0.0.1:48080).

timeoutMs.label: Timeout (ms)
timeoutMs.help: HTTP timeout for /ted doctor and /ted status requests.

sidecarPath.label: Sidecar Path
sidecarPath.help: Optional path to ted sidecar server.mjs (default: sidecars/ted-engine/server.mjs).

autostart.label: Autostart Sidecar
autostart.help: When true (default), gateway startup spawns the local Ted Engine sidecar process.
